data.title: Charming tea house
data.text: Dream About Tea is a quiet, contemplative place to sit with a book and a wonderful cup of tea.  I find it an immensely satisfying experience and so different than other tea/coffee places with loud music and loud talking. There's a time for that kind of ambience, but at Dream About Tea, you know you can sit quietly, have a conversation, read, listen to classical music.  The loose tea selection is large and unique. The owner, Daquan, is lovely and will help you to find a tea that you will enjoy. There are light food choices; including some Chinese pastries, like lotus and red bean cakes.  You will never be hurried or rushed and will be greeted as a friend when you return.
